description: Try our easy to follow Chocolate Cake In A Mug recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Mug cake,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Cherry,Halal,Microwave,High protein,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Chocolate
name: Chocolate Cake In A Mug Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 70g dark chocolate, melted (save 50g grated dark chocolate, to top)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the dry ingredients in a bowl and mix well. Spoon cake mix into clear Cellophane and tie with ribbon. Place in mug.
When ready to cook, empty cake mix into mug. Whisk egg with 2 tbs water in a small bowl. Stir into mix until smooth and well combined. Microwave on HIGH for 2 minutes.
Drizzle cake with melted chocolate. Top with grated chocolate and a cherry.
